mapper.insert: insert into review (rno, bno, id, rcontent, score) values (seq_review.nextval, #{bno}, #{id}, #{rcontent}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(RNO) FROM REVIEW WHERE BNO = #{BNO}
